<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Datos para crear un data subject request.\n","properties":{"kind":{"type":"string","enum":["revoke","change"],"description":"Tipo de solicitud (revocación o cambio).","example":"revoke"},"subject_id":{"type":"string","description":"ID del sujeto de datos que se está modificando.","example":"subj_1B2M2Y8AsgTpgAmY7PhCfg"},"user_reference":{"type":"string","description":"Referencia del usuario en el sistema del cliente.","example":"user_123"},"description":{"type":"string","description":"Descripción detallada de la solicitud.","example":"Solicitud de revocación de consentimiento para uso de datos personales"}},"title":"DataSubjectRequestCreate"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"201":{"description":"Data subject request creado exitosamente","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Los data subject requests representan las solicitudes de los usuarios para modificar agreements.\nEstas solicitudes pueden ser de tipo revocación (revoke) o cambio (change) y pasan por diferentes estados\ndurante su ciclo de vida.\n","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"ID único del data subject request.","example":"dsreq_1B2M2Y8AsgTpgAmY7PhCfg"},"token":{"type":"string","description":"Token único asociado al request.","example":"dsreq_abc123xyz"},"status":{"type":"string","enum":["awaiting_verification","processing","completed","rejected"],"description":"Estado actual de la solicitud.","example":"awaiting_verification"},"user_reference":{"type":"string","description":"Referencia del usuario en el sistema del cliente.","example":"user_123"},"kind":{"type":"string","enum":["revoke","change"],"description":"Tipo de solicitud (revocación o cambio).","example":"revoke"},"description":{"type":"string","description":"Descripción detallada de la solicitud.","example":"Solicitud de revocación de consentimiento para uso de datos personales"},"rejection_reason":{"type":"string","description":"Razón de rechazo si la solicitud fue rechazada.","example":"Documentación insuficiente"},"verified_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Fecha y hora en que la solicitud fue verificada.","example":"2024-03-20T15:30:00Z"},"created_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Fecha y hora de creación de la solicitud.","example":"2024-03-20T15:30:00Z"},"updated_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Fecha y hora de la última actualización de la solicitud.","example":"2024-03-20T15:30:00Z"}},"title":"DataSubjectRequest"}}}},"401":{"description":"Error de autenticación","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["type","title","status","detail"],"properties":{"type":{"type":"string","example":"authentication_error"},"title":{"type":"string","example":"Unauthorized"},"status":{"type":"integer","example":401},"detail":{"type":"string","example":"We could not authenticate your credentials. Please check the documentation at https://docs.soyio.id"}}}}}},"422":{"description":"Error de validación","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","required":["type","title","status","errors"],"properties":{"type":{"type":"string","example":"validation_error"},"title":{"type":"string","example":"Validation error"},"status":{"type":"integer","example":422},"errors":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}},"title":"ValidationError"},{"type":"object","properties":{"errors":{"example":["Kind is not a valid value. Allowed values are: revoke, change","Description can't be blank"]}}}]}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
